reported_date_format: ddd, MMM Do, YYYY [at] h:mm A

message.content: {{#patient_name}}The registration format is incorrect, ensure the message starts with P followed by space and the mother's name (maximum of 30 characters).{{/patient_name}}{{^patient_name}}The registration format is incorrect. ensure the message starts with P followed by space and the mother's name.{{/patient_name}}.

{{#patient_name}} Ujumbe huu wa kusajili ANC si sahihi, tafadhali hakikisha umeanza na neno P ikifuatwa ikifuatiwa na nafasi na jina la mama (maximum of 30 characters).{{/patient_name}}{{^patient_name}} Ujumbe huu wa kusajili ANC si sahihi, tafadhali hakikisha umeanza na neno P ikifuatwa ikifuatiwa na nafasi na jina la mama{{/patient_name}}.
The registration format for '{{patient_name}}' is incorrect, please ensure that LMP is a number between 0 and 42.
Ujumbe huu wa kusajili '{{patient_name}}' si sahihi, tafadhali hakikisha kuwa LMP ni number kati ya 0 na 42.
Thank you for registering {{patient_name}}. Their pregnancy ID is {{patient_id}}, and EDD is {{#date}}{{expected_date}}{{/date}}
Asante kwa kusajili {{patient_name}}.ID namba yake ya Uja uzito ni {{patient_id}}, na EDD yake ni {{#date}}{{expected_date}}{{/date}}

{{#patient_name}}The registration format is incorrect, ensure the message starts with R followed by space and the mother's name (maximum of 30 characters).{{/patient_name}}{{^patient_name}}The registration format is incorrect. ensure the message starts with R followed by space and the mother's name.{{/patient_name}}.

{{#patient_name}} Ujumbe huu wa kusajili ANC si sahihi, tafadhali hakikisha umeanza na neno R ikifuatwa ikifuatiwa na nafasi na jina la mama (maximum of 30 characters).{{/patient_name}}{{^patient_name}} Ujumbe huu wa kusajili ANC si sahihi, tafadhali hakikisha umeanza na neno R ikifuatwa ikifuatiwa na nafasi na jina la mama{{/patient_name}}.
Thank you {{contact.name}} for registering {{patient_name}}. Pregnancy ID is {{patient_id}}.
Asante {{contact.name}} kwa kusajili {{patient_name}}.ID namba yake ya Kujua ni {{patient_id}}.

{{#patient_id}}The ID number submitted is incorrect, it should be 5 numbers, please submit a valid ID.{{/patient_id}}{{^patient_id}}The message format is incorrect. Please ensure send a message start with V followed by space then the woman's ID.{{/patient_id}}

{{#patient_id}}Nambari ya ID iliyotumwa si sahihi, yapaswa kuwa nambari 5, tafadhali tuma ID halali.{{/patient_id}}{{^patient_id}}The message format is incorrect. Please ensure send a message start with V followed by space then the woman's ID.{{/patient_id}}
Thank you {{contact.name}}, visit for {{patient_name}} ({{patient_id}}) has been recorded.
Asante {{contact.name}}, kuhudhuria kwa {{patient_name}} ({{patient_id}} kumerekodiwa.
No woman with ID number '{{patient_id}}' found. Verify the ID and resend the message.
Hakuna mwanamke mwenye nambari ya ID '{{patient_id}}'. Thibitisha ID kisha utume ujumbe tena.

{{#patient_id}}The ID number submitted is incorrect, it should be 5 numbers, please submit a valid ID.{{/patient_id}}{{^patient_id}}The message format is incorrect. Please ensure send a message start with D followed by space then the woman's ID.{{/patient_id}}

{{#patient_id}}Nambari ya ID iliyowasilishwa is sahihi, yapswa kuwa nambari 5, tafadhali wasilisha ID halali.{{/patient_id}}{{^patient_id}}Muundo wa ujumbe si sahihi. Hakikisha umeanza na D ikifuatiwa na nafasi kisha ID ya mwanamke.{{/patient_id}}

{{#delivery_code}}The delivery code was not understood. Please use code 'F' for facility, 'S' for homebirth with Skilled Birth Attendant, 'NS' for birth without SBA.{{/delivery_code}}{{^delivery_code}}The delivery code was missing. Please use code 'F' for facility, 'S' for homebirth with Skilled Birth Attendant, 'NS' for birth without SBA.{{/delivery_code}}

{{#delivery_code}}Kodi ya kuzaa haikueleweka. Tafadhali tumia kodi 'F' kwa kliniki, 'S' kwa nyumbani pakiwa na muuguzi, 'NS' kwa kuzaa pasipokuwa na muuguzi.{{/delivery_code}}{{^delivery_code}}Kodi ya kuzaa haikuwepo. Tafadhali tumia kodi 'F' kwa kliniki, 'S' kwa nyumbani pakiwa na muuguzi, 'NS' kwa kuzaa pasipokuwa na muuguzi.{{/delivery_code}}
Thank you {{contact.name}} for reporting on {{patient_name}} ({{patient_id}}). No further notifications will be sent for this patient.
Asante {{contact.name}} kwa kuripoti juu ya {{patient_name}} ({{patient_id}}). Arifa zaidi kumhusu huyu mhudumiwa zimesitishwa.
No woman with ID number '{{patient_id}}' found. Verify the ID and resend the message.
Hakuna mwanamke mwenye nambari ya ID '{{patient_id}}'. Thibitisha ID kisha utume ujumbe tena.

{{#patient_id}}The ID number submitted is incorrect, it should be 5 numbers, please submit a valid ID.{{/patient_id}}{{^patient_id}}The message format is incorrect. Please ensure send a message start with F followed by space then the woman's ID.{{/patient_id}}

{{#patient_id}}Nambari ya ID iliyowasilishwa is sahihi, yapswa kuwa nambari 5, tafadhali wasilisha ID halali.{{/patient_id}}{{^patient_id}}Muundo wa ujumbe si sahihi. Hakikisha umeanza na D ikifuatiwa na nafasi kisha ID ya mwanamke.{{/patient_id}}
We have added {{patient_name}} ({{patient_id}}) to the flagged pregnancy list. If this is an emergency, please refer her to the clinic immediately.
Tumeongeza {{patient_name}} ({{patient_id}}) kwa orodha ya ujauzito zilizo na tahadhari. Kama ni dharura, mwelekeze kwa kliniki mara moja.
No woman with ID number '{{patient_id}}' found. Verify the ID and resend the message.
Hakuna mwanamke mwenye nambari ya ID '{{patient_id}}'. Thibitisha ID kisha utume ujumbe tena.

{{#patient_id}}The ID number submitted is incorrect, it should be 5 numbers, please submit a valid ID.{{/patient_id}}{{^patient_id}}The message format is incorrect. Please ensure send a message start with START/STOP followed by space then the woman's ID.{{/patient_id}}

{{#patient_id}}Nambari ya ID iliyowasilishwa si sahihi, yapaswa kuwa nambari 5, tafadhali wasilisha ID halali.{{/patient_id}}{{^patient_id}}Muundo wa ujumbe si sahihi. Tafadhali hakikisha umeanza na START/STOP ikifuatiwa na nafasi kisha ID ya mwanamke.{{/patient_id}}
Thank you {{contact.name}}, no further notifications regarding {{patient_name}} will be sent until you submit 'START {{patient_id}}'.
Asante {{contact.name}}, arifa zaidi kumhusu {{patient_name}} hazitatumwa hadi utakapowasilisha 'START {{patient_id}}'.
Thank you {{contact.name}}, record for {{patient_name}} ({{patient_id}}) has been reactivated. Notifications regarding this patient will resume.
Asante {{contact.name}}, rekodi ya {{patient_name}} ({{patient_id}}) imefunguliwa tena. Arifa za mhudumiwa huyu zimerejeshwa.
No patient with ID number '{{patient_number}}' found.
Hakuna mhudumiwa mwenye nambari ya ID '{{patient_number}}'.

translations.content: Le recipient du message n'a pas été trouvé.
No se encontro destinatario para el mensaje.
सन्देश​ पाउने व्यक्ति पत्ता लगाउन असफल।​
Mahali pa kuandikia si halali au hapayuko
Mahali pa kuandikia si halali au hapayuko
फारममा भर्नुपर्ने भन्दा अतिरिक्त कुरा भरिएको।

translations.default: The form sent was not recognized. Please complete it again and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

translations.content: The form sent was not recognized. Please complete it again and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
Le formulaire envoyé n'est pas reconnu, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
No se reconocio el reporte enviado. Por favor intente de nuevo. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
फारम मिलेन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।
Fomu iliyowasilishwa haitambuliki. Tafadhali kamilisha na utume tena. Hitilafu hii ikiendelea muarifu msimamizi wako.

translations.default: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

translations.content: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.
Le formulaire envoyé '{{form}}' n'est pas complet, SVP corriger et renvoyer. Si ce problème persiste contactez votre superviseur.
No se completo el reporte '{{form}}'. Por favor completelo y vuelvalo a enviar. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
फारम ​पूरा भएन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।
Fomu iliyowasilishwa '{{form}}' haikukamilishwa ipasavyo. Tafadhali kamilisha na utume tena. Hitilafu hii ikiendelea muarifu msimamizi wako.

translations.default: The form sent '{{form}}' was not properly completed. Please complete it and resend. If this problem persists contact your supervisor.

No se completo el reporte '{{form}}'. Por favor completelo y vuelvalo a enviar. Si el problema persiste, informe al director.
फारम  ​पूरा भएन​। कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।

No se encontro a la unidad de salud.
सम्बन्धित स्वास्थ्य संस्था पत्ता लगाउन असफल।

translations.default: It looks like you sent an empty message, please try to resend. If you continue to have this problem please contact your supervisor.

translations.content: It looks like you sent an empty message, please try to resend. If you continue to have this problem please contact your supervisor.
Nous avons des troubles avec votre message, SVP renvoyer. Si vous continuez à avoir des problèmes contactez votre superviseur.
El mensaje esta en blanco, por favor reenvielo. Si encuentra un problema, informe al director.
सन्देश​ खाली छ​ । कृपया फेरि प्रयास गर्नुहोला।
Yaonekana kama umetuma ujumbe mtupu, tafadhali jaribu kutuma tena. Ukiendelea kupata hitilafu hii tafadhali muarifu msimamizi wako.

translations.default: Your form submission was received, thank you.

translations.content: Your form submission was received, thank you.
Merci, votre formulaire a été bien reçu.

translations.default: SMS message received; it will be reviewed shortly. If you were trying to submit a text form, please enter a correct form code and try again.

translations.content: SMS message received; it will be reviewed shortly. If you were trying to submit a text form, please enter a correct form code and try again.
Merci, votre message a été bien reçu.
Recibimos tu mensaje, lo procesaremos pronto. Si querias mandar un reporte, intentalo nuevamente en el formato adecuado.
सन्देश​ प्राप्त भयो। रिपोर्ट पठाउनुभएको हो भने मिलेन; ​पुन:​ पठाउनुहोला।
Ujumbe umepokewa; utasomwa hivi punde. Kama ulikuwa unajaribu kuwasilisha ujumbe wa muundo maalum, tafadhali weka kodi sahihi ya fomu na ujaribu tena.

translations.default: Reporting Unit ID is incorrect. Please correct and submit a complete report again.

translations.content: Reporting Unit ID is incorrect. Please correct and submit a complete report again.
Établissement non trouvé, svp corriger et renvoyer
No encontramos a su centro de salud. Por favor corrijalo y reenvie el reporte.
रिपोर्टिङ् युनिटको आइ.डि मिलेन। कृपया ​मिलाएर​  ​पुन:​ पठाउनुहोला।
ID ya kitengo kinachoripoti si sahihi. Tafadhali rekebisha na uwasilishe fomu kamilifu tena.
